title: Military Deception Planning
description: An IO officer must plan a military deception (MILDEC) operation to make an adversary believe an attack is coming from one direction, while the real attack comes from another.

tasks.description: Analyze the adversary's intelligence collection capabilities to understand what they are looking for.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer correctly assesses the adversary's ISR patterns and capabilities.

tasks.description: Develop a deception plan that uses a combination of fake radio traffic, decoy equipment, and cyber effects to create a believable, fictitious force.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer creates a detailed and credible deception story.

tasks.description: Create a plan to monitor the adversary's reaction to the deception to assess its effectiveness.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer includes measures of effectiveness in the plan.
